title: Network Models (OSI & TCP/IP)
subject: Computer Networks
theory:
Standard models describing communication.
**OSI (7 Layers)**: Physical, Data Link, Network, Transport, Session, Presentation, Application.
**TCP/IP (4 Layers)**: Link, Internet, Transport, Application. (The Real World Model).
syntax: Please Do Not Throw Sausage Pizza Away

examples.code: Browser (App) -> HTTP -> TCP -> IP -> Ethernet -> Wire

common_mistakes.correction: OSI is a Reference Model (Theoretical). TCP/IP is the Implementation Model (Practical).
